metadata.title: CVE-2023-6110 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in OpenStack. When a user tries to delete a non-existingaccess rule in it's scope, it deletes other existing access rules which arenot associated with any application credentials.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6110` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-openstackclient - 5.8.0-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-openstackclient package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.8.0-0ubuntu1.1').
